Articles.Content:
Hey guys. I was wondering if someone can explain how to use Mechjeb Rendezous Module. There are alot of buttons and its freakin confusing..lol.

Thanks

There is a link to the Online Manual right on the MechJeb tab.

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Thanks for the reply but im sorry to be a pain. I dont see the link to the online manual.
Make sure you have version 1.8.4 of MechJeb; it has a button in the side tab labeled 'online manual'.

Sorry for the late thanks... I see it now.

Thanks again
Learn how to do a rendez-vous manually first. Then you will have acquired some of the methodology and concepts you need to use it.

i have trouble using it also, i know how to use the buttons and stuff but i cant get any closer than 400m to something and the thing is usually going 50m/s passed me so i cant get to it. any help would be appreciated.

> 
> i have trouble using it also, i know how to use the buttons and stuff but i cant get any closer than 400m to something and the thing is usually going 50m/s passed me so i cant get to it. any help would be appreciated.

What I have learned with many of mechjebs functions - Mechjeb is certainly not perfect. A manual override one mechjeb gets you close is sometimes required, just speed yourself up and catch up to it.
